Contact Us

For more information about The AI Clinic, please contact Director Bill Howe at billhowe@uw.edu or Robert Wolfe at rwolfe3@uw.edu.

You can submit an inquiry to engage our services by navigating to the clinic services pages:

  • Office Hours
  • Short-Term Consulting
  • Long-Term Consulting

We will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible.

About The AI Clinic

The AI Clinic is an initiative of the UW iSchool to make language models more approachable in research.
